Package xal.tools.math.r2

Package contains tools for working in the space of real number pairs (x,y) ∈ R2.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    R2
    Class representing a point on the plane in R2.
    R2x2
    Represents an element of R2x2, the set of real 3x3 matrices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    R2x2.IND
    Enumeration of the allowed index positions for objects of type R2x2.

Package xal.tools.math.r2 Description

Package contains tools for working in the space of real number pairs (x,y) ∈ R2. This includes algebraic structures and topological structures.
Since:
Sep 27, 2013
